subject: Re: [junit] API documentation up-to-date?
msgSnippet: I did comment on #570 as it seems related. I see there are 185 open issues already, that is the price for junit s success, probably ;-). Regards Mirko -- Sent
messageBody:
I did comment on #570 as it seems related. I see there are 185 open issues
already, that is the price for junit's success, probably ;-).

Regards Mirko
--
Sent from my mobile
